title: Texting Tutor PT 2: She Needs To Break Some Bad News To The Guy She's Dating
description:
You’re conflicted. But you just don’t KNOW how to approach your problem…especially if you’re not a confrontational person. So sometimes, you just need a little help addressing the situation – and that’s where we come in! We’ll tell you what to text the person, line by line, and we’ll help you resolve the problem…but you have to PROMISE to write EXACTLY what we tell you to.
Up this week - she needs to tell the guy she's been dating for just a few weeks that she's moving out of state for a job...but she doesn't want to break things off. Can we convince him to do long distance?

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
